thread.title: 15 Jewellery Sets For The Fashion Girl On A Budget (All Under Rs.429!)
thread.title_full: 15 Jewellery Sets For The Fashion Girl On A Budget (All Under Rs.429!)

author: craftsvilla
title: 15 Jewellery Sets For The Fashion Girl On A Budget (All Under Rs.429!)
text:
By craftsvilla February 3, 2017 
It’s that time of the year again when you have to raid mom’s closet for a saree … or suck in your stomach and hope to fit into last year’s lehenga … because its #ShaadiSeason. While you are busy putting the perfect outfit together, we’ve made your job a tad easier and compiled an amazing jewellery guide that’ll go with ANYTHING that you are planning to wear. And guess what, you don’t even need to wait for your appraisal next month to get your hands on them … they’ll cost you as little as Rs.429. Grab that debit card and go crazy (and thanks for the good vibes you just sent our way). 
The traditional way 
Planning to try that sock bun hairstyle you’ve been reading all about for your BFF’s sangeet ceremony? We found you the perfect earrings to complement your fancy hairdo. 
The classy vibe 
Whoever said gold was boring has never found the perfect accessory. This traditional neckpiece comes with a set of dainty earrings, perfect for that mehendi function. 
The kundan charm 
Nothing better than a kundan set to complement that lehenga … well actually we’ve got something better; a kundan set, set in pink to channel that diva vibe. 
The edgy style 
Who said traditional jewellery has to be boring? This beautiful gold set with coins is going to look fantastic with your crop top and lehenga. 
That floral glory 
Floral motifs are the best thing about traditional jewellery. This multi-colour stone set is exactly what you need for behen ki shaadi. 
The royal way 
There is something about deep blue that makes everything look oh-so-royal! Point in case being this traditional necklace set with deep blue stones. Lovely, isn’t it? 
Must-See: 
The classy lady 
Kundan needs to be your go-to accessory when you are looking to combine ethnic style with that classy feel. Loose curls, red lips and THIS. 
The ethnic soul 
A pearl drop design is the perfect accessory for every wedding. And when it’s set in gold … well, just buy it. 
The colour frenzy 
Green, maroon and gold … it really doesn’t get better than this! 
The culture queen 
Show the world who is the queen with this funky gold design. We think it’ll go perfectly well with six-inch heels and a skirt that you can twirl in. 
The golden fairy 
Just because bling is not your thing, you don’t need to shy away from gold. We totally recommend this necklace set for all your festive needs. 
The flower charmer 
Little hints of pink with gold … exactly what the fashion police ordered. 
The diva in red 
What’s a wedding without hints of red and gold? This is going to be the perfect addition to your festive wardrobe. 
The demure bridesmaid 
Got an Indo-western gown to flaunt at that wedding? This is exactly what you need! 
The bling queen
